name: cyclically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that happens in a particular order, and is often repeated: Seasonal cooking allows menus to evolve and to return cyclically. Profits tend to be cyclically higher at certain times of year.
More examplesFewer examplesThe process may be cyclically repeated using the same or different ingredients.The tablets are usually taken cyclically for 21 days with a seven-day gap between cycles.We often assume that history moves cyclically and very slowly.Supply of the product is likely to outstrip cyclically adjusted demand.
